name: Ablaze Ascent
description:
GO UP IN FLAMES

Ablaze Ascent is a vertical precision platformer with a focus on speedrunning. You are faced with a series of increasingly challenging levels and a time limit of 10 minutes to beat them all. Learning hard shortcuts is key to saving extra time!

The game features carefully tuned controls, 3 unique worlds with varying obstacles, 30 hand-crafted levels, and 5 completable challenges for those that want to really put their skills to the test. 

What awaits at the top? Guide the little flaming guy up there and find out!

OTHER FEATURES
  • Practice mode without a time limit
  • Level select mode for practicing specific levels
  • A "long wall jump" move for extra mobility
  • "Personal best" tracking for score and time
  • Controller support
  • Rebindable controls for both keyboard and controller
DEFAULT CONTROLS KeyboardControllerMoveArrow keysLeft Joystick / D-Pad
JumpXA (Xbox) / X (Playstation)Long wall jump (hold)ZRight trigger CREDITS

NOTE: The game is currently locked to a 16:9 aspect ratio. If your screen is narrower, there will be letterboxing.
